metadata.Plot: Financially troubled, a newbie hitman reluctantly takes the job of finding the plotted killer of a Japanese tycoon, but things complicate when the tycoon is killed and he is forced to ally with a misfortunate hitman to find the "King of the Hitman."
metadata.Writer: Hing-Ka Chan, Kam Fu Cheng, Vincent Kok
metadata.Actors: Jet Li, Eric Tsang, Simon Yam
